website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Tri Fusion is an affordable, lightweight running shoe. It features ample support, smooth transition, and impressive traction. It is a neutral running shoe that performs well on the road. This daily running shoe gained positive feedback from users because it delivers above-average performance compared to other cheap running shoes.
pros: Most runners gave positive impressions on how comfortable the Nike Tri Fusion was for them
The shoe features the tri-density mid-sole for better cushioning and smoother transition
The lateral midfoot strap and overlays provide additional support and structure
Most runners applauded the diamond design in the solid rubber outsole because it adds durability and promotes multidirectional traction
This model a roomy toe box for better toe splaying
This shoe has an affordable price
cons: Some runners mentioned that the outsole layer of the shoe started peeling off earlier than expected
Cushioning of the shoe needs improvement, as stated in some reviews
Upper mesh is not totally breathable

customer_reviews.title: Fly sneakers that will help you fly!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers! They are super fly and were so comfy from the get go! I felt they really helped my running game (i do only run on the treadmill less than 10 miles a week) It did take a couple uses for me to break them in but I felt like it was much quicker than my last pair of sneakers. The sneakers felt so supportive and I have a high arch and I felt they really helped with that. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mouss

customer_reviews.title: very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really nice. I always wear a 7.5 bought that size and they fit perfect. I didn't listen to others to go a size up and I'm glad I didn't because they fit perfect. They are kind of narrow though so if you have wide feet they probably wouldn't be that comfortable. I think they are very comfortable and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are comfortable and I am on my feet all day. Love the colors. Wish I had them in several colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. I received many compliments on them. They do get dirty easily though, because of the fabric & light color. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara C.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I will definitely order these shoes again my feet can breathe and the best run in. My feet are cushioned.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Size ran small
customer_reviews.text: They ran small. I got the same size I always get when I buy Nike's and they were too small. I had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! :)
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box...fit perfect. Got theu a double boot camp session & zero blisters or hot spots!! Love these! Ordered women's 8M and the fix exactly perfect. Almost want another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable shoes. I'm not that crazy about the look but I enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Viri

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable, I wear them at work as I'm standing ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly...so comfortable, I wear them at work as I'm standing & walking around all day...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great and match with everything
customer_reviews.text: I wear these everyday! They are great and match with everything.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was within a week and arrived a bit early. My wife loved them and fit her well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes for running , hard initially but after 2 times are great

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They hurt the back of my heel. I got a blister the first day I wore them.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes fit great super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Item came less than a week after being order! I love these shoes fit great super comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoes for Indoor/Outdoor
customer_reviews.text: These are a great running or training shoe. I wear almost everyday to the gym for running on the treadmill as well as strength training exercises. They are not as lightweight as the Nike Free shoes but I prefer my running shoes to be a bit sturdier. Great for outdoors too. Will order my next pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: ... feel a bit stiff but I'm sure they'll be great! Really good looking
customer_reviews.text: They feel a bit stiff but I'm sure they'll be great! Really good looking. The only issue is one is a little looser than the other an rubs my ankle a bit Not sure why
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.O
